title: The Great Bridge, Rouen (Le Grand Pont, Rouen)
provenance_text:
Camille Pissarro [1830-1903]; Durand-Ruel, Paris, bought from the artist on December 11, 1896 [1]; Durand-Ruel, New York, NY, by November 1,1900 [2]; purchased by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, December 1900.
 
Notes:
[1]. See "Pissarro: Critical Catalogue of Paintings" by Joachim Pissarro and Claire Durand-Ruel Snollaerts, vol. 3, 2005, no. 1141. 
[2]. Shown at the Fifth Annual Exhibition at Carnegie Institute (Carnegie International), 1900, through Durand-Ruel, New York, NY.

creator.birth_place: Charlotte Amalie (Virgin Islands of the United States) (Danish colony at the time)
